duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct annual plan reviews, investment reviews, and service meetings with clients and brokers.
Bring consultative elements to client relationships to enhance loyalty and satisfaction.
Serve as the escalation point for resolution of non-routine issues related to service.
Drive cross-sell opportunities to enhance client and enterprise profitability.
Train clients on company processes, procedures, and resources.
Contribute to and participate in department and organization-wide projects to enhance service and improve client satisfaction and retention.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a business-related field or equivalent education/experience. (Master's preferred)
